response.overview: A man dies and willed all his properties to his son but he can't inherit them unless he goes back to his father's hometown to fight and bring back the Staff of Okomfo Anokye. Okomfo Anokye is a legendary African priest who lived in Ancient times. What is the connection between the Man and OKOMFO ANOKYE and what is the connection between The Past and The Present?
response.title: The Missing Staff
